text:
@TeamTrump @realDonaldTrump What do all of the below have in common that are failing, collapsing and are no longer strong?

GOVERNMENT ADMIN
UNEMPLOYMENT
COVID-19 PANDEMIC
STOCK MARKET
HEALTHCARE
ECONOMY
THE PRESIDENCY
DOJ
THE COURTS
1ST AMEND.
OUR ALLIES......

Answer:
THEY'RE ALL RUN BY REPUBLICANS!
